value:
This world is amazing, Ninian. It's full
of mystery and potential. You can
really feel a sense of hope here.

Nothing quite like a festival, is there?
Everyone's up so late celebrating, so
it feels like the day will last forever.

You look like you could use a nap.
Go catch some winks—I'll wake you
when something interesting happens.

I've got to tell you, I'm having a great
time. There's a spring in my step,
$Nu. I can feel it!

Have you seen that weird lady acting
like she's queen of the ghosts or
something? Wait, what? She's who?!

Happy harvest festival! Want to come
join me for the parade over at
$Nf's castle?

I knew it'd be fine. Now, let's get
back to some festival fun!

Trick or treat! I'm coming for all
the candy!
Ha! Haha... This is a joke, right?

If this is your idea of a treat, I'm sure
not complaining!

Hi! I'm Nils. Now I say "trick or treat,"
and you give me something nice,
right? That's how this goes?

Being a bard has taught me a lot.
I've been to all sorts of places, and
met all kinds of interesting people.$k$pSome of those people were bad, but
just as many were great. I've seen so
much honesty, bravery, and kindness.$k$pI like to show my appreciation for
people with music, so I'm thinking of
putting on a little concert here.$k$pCommander Anna agrees that the
festival's perfect for it, so she's going
to get an audience together for me.$k$pMaybe my flute music isn't as useful
as what my sister can do, but I want
to do something for my new friends.$k$pThat means you! So come to the
castle courtyard with me and
enjoy the tunes, OK? Let's go!
Trick or treat!
Your candy or your life!
Fear the frosting!
Icing on the cake!
I've been tricked…
Let's find some treats!
Rouse your spirits!
I'd say this choice of outfit is delicious!
I'm pretty good with the flute. I bet I could liven things up with a tune or two!
I can't wait to go around the festival with Ninian. It's going to be so much fun!
I wonder if humans and dragons will ever celebrate together like this in my world...
The candy you gave me is so pretty, it's almost a shame to eat it. Almost!
We ready?
What's next?
This'll be fun.
